cAutoSeismic Methods

The cAutoSeismic type exposes the following members.

Methods
NameDescription
GetASCE716
Retrieves auto seismic loading parameters for the 2016 ASCE 7 code

Retrieves auto seismic loading parameters for the 2016 ASCE 7 code
GetIBC2006
SetASCE716
Defines auto seismic loading parameters for the 2016 ASCE 7 code

Defines auto seismic loading parameters for the 2016 ASCE 7 code
